videos.headline: LSU fumbles on first play
videos.description: RB Nick Brossette is slammed at the line and loses the ball resulting in a turnover on the first play from scrimmage for the Tigers.

videos.headline: Troy on the board first
videos.description: QB Brandon Silvers sneaks in to the endzone for the early score to take the lead.

videos.headline: Trojans gain 74 yards on huge run
videos.description: RB Jordan Chunn bursts up the middle for a gain of 74 yards and sets the Trojans up in the red zone.

videos.headline: Chunn caps drive with rushing TD
videos.description: Trojans take a commanding lead thanks to RB Jordan Chunn's diving effort on the goal-line for the rushing TD.

videos.headline: Confusion reigns for LSU-Troy at end of half
videos.description: Troy pleads to add a few seconds to the clock at the end of the half and is able to capitalize after the refs bring the teams out from the locker room.

videos.headline: LSU cuts the lead with passing TD
videos.description: QB Myles Brennan connects with Foster Moreau for the 7-yard score to bring the Tigers within 10.

videos.headline: Tigers' drive halted on Trojans' INT
videos.description: QB Myles Brennan throws it into a crowd and the Trojans walk away with the ball.

videos.headline: LSU quick TD keeps them close
videos.description: A 34-yard strike from QB Danny Etling to Russell Gage gives LSU some life.

videos.headline: Troy fumbles the ball back to LSU
videos.description: RB Jordan Chunn puts the ball on the turf and LSU recovers late in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: LSU onside kick fails in the 4th quarter
videos.description: The Tigers attempt to get the ball back off the kick falls flat.

videos.headline: LSU drive continues on 4th down conversion
videos.description: QB Danny Etling finds a hole up the middle and scrambles for 12 yards to keep the drive alive on fourth down.

videos.headline: Tigers are within 3 after passing TD
videos.description: Danny Etling finds Foster Moreau up the middle for the 20-yard score to get within three.

videos.headline: Onside kick fails with just under 2 minutes for LSU
videos.description: The Tigers tried for another onside kick after the touchdown, but fail to recover again.

videos.headline: LSU's comeback was stopped after INT
videos.description: The Tigers had one last attempt and the long pass was intercepted by Troy to seal the upset over LSU.

videos.headline: Troy celebrates upset over LSU
videos.description: The Troy locker room was alive after the upset of LSU.

videos.headline: Troy upsets LSU on road
videos.description: Troy jumps out to a 17-0 lead in the third quarter and holds on to defeat LSU 24-21, giving the Tigers' their first home loss to a non-SEC team since 2000.
